S:log-item.D:comment:
DERBY-3343: Subsequent calls to PreparedStatement cause SQLIntegrityConstraintViolationException on column that is "Generated always"
Modifies the logic in ResultColumn.getOrderableVariantType() so that it behaves correctly even when a default column is explicitly mentioned in an insert statement.
Merged with svn merge -r 615202:615203 ../derby-commit
Simple merge with no conflicts; no additional changes were necessary.
